articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: E.U. regulator approves injectable HIV drug that experts say could help stop transmission - NBC News
articles.description: The European Medicines Agency has recommended authorizing a twice-yearly injectable drug aimed at preventing HIV, which scientists say could help end transmission.
articles.content:
LONDON The European Medicines Agency has recommended authorizing a twice-yearly injectable drug aimed at preventing HIV, which scientists say could help end the virus transmission.
